alert.note: Alert for Northern St. Lawrence; Southeastern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued December 25 at 4:26AM EST until December 25 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches expected, with highest amounts west of Route 56. * WHERE...Northern St. Lawrence and Southeastern St. Lawrence Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

area.areaDesc: Northern St. Lawrence; Southeastern St. Lawrence
